Sentence_ConvertIdeoAttemptFail.rulePack.li: sent->[RECIPIENT_nameDef]は説得を受け入れなかった.

Sentence_ConvertIdeoAttemptFailResentmen.li: sent->[RECIPIENT_nameDef]は説得を受け入れず,むしろ激怒した.

Sentence_ConvertIdeoAttemptFailSocialFig.li: sent->[RECIPIENT_nameDef]は怒りで応え,逆に論戦を挑んできた.

Sentence_ConvertIdeoAttemptSuccess.ruleP.li: sent->[RECIPIENT_nameDef]は説得を受け入れ,[RECIPIENT_possessive]に思想を変更した.
